Embleme 19. Of the Secrets of Nature.
If you kill one of the fower, they will all suddenly weewedye.

lg.l: Behold weewefoure brethen here together stand,
One having earth, water the next in hand,
The third holds weeweaire, and fire the fourth alone:
If you would all destroy, kill weeweonely one,
And they will all forthwith resigneresign to death,
Their lives depending weewejoyntly on one breath.
